articles.author: Jeremy Werner
articles.title: Quick hits: No. 19 Indiana embarrasses No. 9 Illinois 63-10 in worst loss of Bret Bielema's tenure - 247Sports
articles.description: Indiana completely outclassed Illinois in the Big Ten opener for both teams
articles.content:
BLOOMINGTON, Ind. — Hours before the game, Indiana fans swarmed the tailgates around Memorial Stadium, looking jovial and primed for a party.
The No. 19-ranked Hoosiers obliged them with plenty of c… [+5449 chars]
